com.pump.awt.text

Class BlockLetter.Simple

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.awt.text.BlockLetter
      • com.pump.awt.text.BlockLetter.Simple
  • Enclosing class:
    BlockLetter

    public static class BlockLetter.Simple
extends BlockLetter
    This BlockLetter has no gradients; the depth of the letter is one uniform (unnuanced) Paint:

    This will be slightly faster than the Gradient implementation, so if you are performing animation for the user this might be the best choice.

    • Method Detail

      • getDepthBlocks

        protected java.awt.Shape[] getDepthBlocks()
        Return the 2 shapes required to render the depth of this BlockLetter. The first shape should correspond to block1Paint and the second shape should correspond to block2Paint.
        Returns:
        the two shapes required to render the depth of this BlockLetter.

      • paintDepth

                       float x,
                       float y)
        Description copied from class: BlockLetter
        Paint the depth ("the 3D part") of this BlockLetter.
        Specified by:
        paintDepth in class BlockLetter
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics to draw to
        x - the x-coordinate indicating where to paint.
        y - the y-coordinate indicating where to paint.
